lines.text: Sean Archer here, who's calling?
Well if you're Sean Archer, I guess I'm Castor Troy.
If you dress like Halloween, ghouls will try to get in your pants.
I want to take his face... off. Eyes, nose, skin, teeth. It's coming off.
No more drugs for that man.
Isn't this religious, ah yes. The eternal battle between good and evil, saint and sinners... but you're still not having any FUN!
You're not the only one in the family with the brains.
No, although now I am the only one with the looks.
Touché.
your face or your body. I mean I enjoy *boning* your wife, but let's face it, we both like it better the other way, yes? So why don't we trade back.
You can't give back what you've taken from me.
OK, then... plan B, why don't we just kill each other?
[a faceless Castor Troy confronts Dr. Walsh after waking from a coma]
What the hell is this?
I partook of a few of your groovy painkillers. Oh, bravo. Bra-fucking-vo. Oh God, this is excellent. Bravo!
What do you want?
Take one goddamn guess!

[as Castor Troy]
This is between us. Leave them out of it.

[as Sean Archer]
No. You should have left them out of it. Your son was an accident. I wanted to kill you. But, you took it too personally. Why couldn't you just kill yourself or let it go?

[as Castor Troy]
No father could.

[as Sean Archer]
No brother could either.

[coming in]
Neither could a sister.
[Tito, Sean Archer's best friend was killed by Castor Troy]
Listen, sir... we just want you to know...
We're all really sorry about Tito.

[as Sean Archer]
Yeah, well, shit happens.
Y'know, I could eat a peach for hours.
Sasha, what the *fuck*... are you doing here?
[Troy and Archer see each other for the first time with each other's faces]

[grins]
OOOEEEE, you're good lookin'! You're hot!
[cocks his head]
It's like looking in a mirror, only not.
Troy?
Now that is between us. OK?
But you were, were, uh...
In a coma? Nothing like having your face cut off to disturb your sleep! Read the newspaper lately?
[shows him a newspaper article headlined "Deadly Inferno at Walsh Institute"]
You killed them?
Yeah well, beats paying the bill, huh? I mean, come on, uh, if a face lift costs five grand...
[shows Archer's wedding ring on his hand]
... SEE ANYTHING YOU LIKE?
[Cut to a shot of Miller, Dr. Walsh, and Tito, all bound and gagged, being doused with gasoline]

[feeling a lump forming in his throat]
Tito!
[In flashback, a hand drops a lit cigarette in a puddle of gasoline that quickly spreads towards the captives]

I torched all the evidence that proves you're you, okay? So, wow! Looks like you're going to be in here for THE NEXT HUNDRED YEARS! Now, I have got to go. I've got a government job to abuse and a lonely wife to fuck! Whoops did I just say that? I'm sorry... make love to! God, I miss that face!
[Archer throws his hands around Castor's neck and tries to strangle him. Guards promptly rush in and pull Archer off Castor]
You turned your beeper off.
Yes, well... my son's birthday.
Well, here's some poetic justice, sir... Castor Troy's dead.
He got killed trying to escape from Erewhon.
Where's his body? I want to see his body.
It hasn't been recovered yet.
IT HASN'T BEEN *RECOVERED YET*? *Get the LAPD on this!*
Even if he is alive, Castor isn't stupid enough to come back to the city.
You must... you must trust me. He's already here.
Any word from the LAPD intelligence? If there IS such a thing?
Not yet, sir.
Of course not, because we're a covert anti-terrorist team that is so secret, that when we snap our fingers NOTHING HAPPENS!

[as Eve leaves]
I hate to see you go, but I LOVE to watch you leave.
Wheee. What a predicament.

[cutting his face with glass shard]
You are right, Sean. I misbehaved. I have to be punished. But remember... Every time when you look in the mirror, you'll see my face.

[after saving Archers daughter from help boyfriend raping her]
Do you have protection?
Protection? You mean like condoms?

[pulls out his switchblade]
Protection. Next time, let Carl take his pants down, slip this in his thigh, twist it. So the wound won't close...
[gives her the knife]
Go on, get out of here.
[Jamie leaves]
I am the King!
I AM Castor Troy!
Interception! Now our side's got the ball. Sorry!
Lies, deceit, mixed messages... this is turning into a real marriage.
If I were to send you flowers where would I... no, let me rephrase that. If I were to let you suck my tongue, would you be grateful?

[sobbing]
Please tell me what planet I'm on!

[holding onto Troy's neck, having him bent over]
Die! Please God die!

[Both have each other at gun point]
Wow. We have something in common. We both know our guns.
What we don't have in common, is that I don't care if I live, and you do.
Sean, that hurts. You're not having any fun, are you, Sean? Why don't you join us? Try Terrorism-for-hire, we can blow shit up, it's more FUN!
Shut the fuck up!
You watch your FUCKIN' MOUTH! I'm about to unleash the biblical plague "Hell-A" deserves. But I'll give this SHITHOLE a break if my brother and I walk.

[Not believing what troy is saying]
Bullshit.

Oh, no? Oh, you think I'm bluffing, oh yeah. Maybe I am. But then maybe I'm NOT! Besides, what are you gonna do with me locked up? You'll drive your wife and kid crazy. Oh by the way, how is your daughter, Janie? Your darling peach, is she ripe yet...
[Making barking noises and pulls the trigger on the gun and realizes that he is out of bullets, and falls to his knees]
Please don't shoot me, man. I'm scared, Sean.
[gets a knife]
Well, I think you better pull the trigger, because I don't give a FUCK!
[singing]
I'm ready, Ready for the big ride, BABY!
Fly bitch!

[Jamie shot Archer in the shoulder, now Troy has the gun on her]
Clod! No daughter of mine would shoot so wide.
[to Archer]
DAD! *Put* the gun down! Put it down. Dad, put it down.
[to Jamie]
Now we're going to find out what's in Papa's bag, Peaches!
[licks Jamie's face]
Say good-bye to Papa.

You are now the property of Erewhon Prison. A citizen of nowhere. The Geneva Convention is void here; Amnesty International doesn't know we exist. When I say your ass belongs to me, I mean exactly that.
[looking at Jamie in her underwear]
[to himself]
The plot thickens.

[on the phone]
Carl, I'll have to call you back.
[hangs up]
You're not respecting my boundaries.
I'm coming in, Janie.
Janie?

[seeing a pillow that says Jamie on it, he realizes his mistake]
I don't think you heard me, JAMIE. You got something I crave.
[closes in on Jamie, reaches back and grabs her pack of cigarettes]
Danielle left those here.
I won't tell mom if you don't.
[puts a cigarette in his mouth and lights it]
When did you start smoking?
You'll be seeing a lot of changes around here.
[blows smoke rings at Jamie]
Papa's got a brand new bag. OW!

[Not realizing that he is talking with Sean Archer with Troy's face]
Not feeling very coordinated lately, are you?

[Trying to act like Troy]
Listen, bro. I am soooo fried. If the psychos find out I'm this wacky we're both dead meat.
Shock treatment? What's the matter, did they operate?
[Pollux touches Archer's face]
I was in a COMA! Jesus, you're still so frickin' paranoid! Aren't they giving you your medication in here?
What *was* my medication?

[sighing in exasperation]
Pollux, I hand-fed you those pills for years. Vivex! I haven't forgotten *that*.

[beat]
It's just everything else. My reflexes, my synapses, it's all like a...

[beat]
tab of bad Quantrax.

[beat]
I don't even know why that fucking Yeti jumped me the other day.
Dubov? You had a sex sandwich with his wife and his sister the night he was sent here.
Well, that explains why he was so upset. We're gonna blow up L.A., bro. Ain't that cool?
Sure, rub my nose in it, why don't you. Ten million dollar design and those Militia nut jobs get to keep their cash.
It's so fucking unfair! That bomb you built does deserve an audience. I mean, it's a work of art, it belongs in the Louvre.
Yes, it does. Oh well, I guess the L.A. Convention Center will just have to do.

[rejoices as Pollux just revealed the location of the bomb]
Thank you.
For what?
Oh, bro. You are so fuckin' pathetic.
Sean Archer here, who's calling?
Well if you're Sean Archer, I guess I'm Castor Troy.
[hangs up]
Ah, yes.
You look like you just fucked your mother.
Sir why are you so upset? It's just Pollux Troy.
[Troy blow's Loomis' head off]
Hey Sean, how's your dead son?
When we put this thing away, you can brand the fourth amendment on my butt.
Dad, I'm sorry I shot you.
Eve, listen to me. The man you think is your husband isn't.
Who is this?
Listen. Take Jamie. Go to your mother's. Don't tell him where you're going, just go!
Whoever you are, don't call again!
HOLD IT!
Good girl, Jamie. SHOOT HIM!
Honey, don't listen to him. He's not your father.
[Archer's original voice]
Hear my voice. I'M YOUR FATHER!
Use your eyes, Jamie and shoot him!
Don't shoot. Just don't...
This scumbag, this SCUMBAG shot your BROTHER Jamie. SHOOT HIM!
[Jamie shoots Archer in the shoulder]
God damn. My place is getting FUCKED up.
Ha HA HA HA HA Ha!
When all else fails - fresh tactics!
Seeing that face on you makes me afraid my tiramisu might come back up.
Well, think about me. This nose. This hair. This ridiculous chin.

[as Sean Archer]
Sasha, baby, I'm Castor. That's Archer.
And I'm bored. Put the fucking gun down!

[Pinning Karl against the car]
Say you're sorry.
I'm Sorry!
I didn't hear it.

[Louder]
I'm Sorry!
Mean it.
I'm So Sorry!
[after Archer gets in a fight with Dubov]
I stop the fights, not you. That's two strikes for you, Dubov. One more, and you know where you're going.
When I get out of here...
If you get out of here.
...I'm gonna have you fired.
It's a capital crime to try to kill the next big boss of the FBl, yes?

[struggling]
Yes... the penalty...
What?
...The penalty is death!
[Hits him]

I was thinking the other day, I remember I once took a date out for surf and turf, not knowing she was a vegetarian, so she ate bread and broke her tooth on a rice seed, we drove around all night, looking for an all night dentist, and he was so drunk he fixed the wrong tooth, when I finally brought her home, even though it must've hurt like hell, you kissed me
Brother, we're going straight
My goodness did you exchange brains as well?
First thing I need you to confess to is the location of the bomb
What about our ten million dollars?
What about when I become an American hero for defusing the bomb? What's that worth? Know that, thank you, next question
[both laugh]
I've said and done some things that made your life hard, I know
How would you? when you left you never looked back
I just know,
[Adam walks in]
Sasha I'm not the same person you remember and for what it's worth I'm sorry,
[getting dressed]
nice looking clothes
Yeah, of course their yours

[Sees Adam]
nice looking kid too
Yeah, of course, his yours too

The last time I saw you was in this room, we had a fight when I said I had to go away again I spent the night in Mike's old bed, the assignment was to enter a federal prison as Castor Troy, just fucking insane, a special ops surgeon gave me Caster's face and somehow Castor came out of his coma and killed everybody who knew about the mission not before transforming into me,
[breaks the glass in Michael's picture frame and removes the photo]
I know you don't believe a word I'm saying, well here's proof doctor your husband, me, my Sean's blood type O-negative Castor's AB
What's the next move?
This isn't your fight
He killed my brother, I'm not going to let him kill you too
No matter what happens I promise Sean Archer's off your back for good

[Introducing Adam to Jamie and Eve]
This is Adam and he needs a place to live why don't show Adam his new room?
Come on

[nods]
Ok
Happy Birthday, Mikey. He took our baby, Sean. He took our little boy.
Don't you remember the little people?
Well, Sean, I knew it only a matter of time before you forgot where we lived.
Come on, gimme a break, every house on this block looks the same.
The bomb will blow and Castor Troy will win!

[after Archer knocks Castor unconscious]
Well, Sean... Looks like Elvis done left the building.
I never really enjoyed the Messiah, in fact, I think it's fucking boring. But your voice makes even hack like Handel seem like a genius.
[sings "Hallelujah" along with the choir, then grabs the girl's butt and orgasms]

[Reading Eve's diary]
"Date night fizzled again we hadn't made love in two months", what a loser

[giving a speech]
Everybody, I want to thank you for enduring all these years that I was an insufferable bore.
Sir, did you just have a surgical procedure?
[Castor's smile freezes. He is unsure what Wanda means]
What do you mean?
Well, was the stick successfully removed from your ass?
[relieved, Castor bursts out laughing. The others join his laughter]

[On the phone with Pollux]
What I'm trying to tell you brother, Pollux once we get the full protection and resources of the government to get rid of our rivals right? then we'll set, and maybe just maybe I'll get my freaking face back, then I'll just have one jag off to take care
[seeing Karl and Jamie in a car]
Maybe two, happy hunting I'll catch you later.

[Her last words]
Take care of our boy, love him so much, and don't let him grow up to be like us promise?

[Nods]
Yeah
So, once we kidnap "supercop", then what?

[smiles enigmatically, moving his finger across his face]
Tiny... surgery.
[Dietrich looks at "Castor" confused]
l'd like to take his... his face... off. Yes. Now, if you'll excuse me, l have to use the little boy's wee-wee room.
[Sean stands and starts to walk away]
Cas...
[Sean turns back to Dietrich]
You wanna take his... face...

[smiles widely]
Yes. His face... off. Eyes...
[Sean slightly pinches Dietrich's nose]
...nose. Skin. lt's coming off.
[Sean walks away, leaving the others totally confused of his last words]

[mimicks Sean's gesture]
The face... off.
